headline: The Trump Org Finds a New Way to Play Dirty With NY Investigators
author: Jose Pagliery
sentences: However, in a letter to prosecutors, attorney Lawrence Rosen, who represents the Trump Organization, cast the AG’s complaints as an attempt to “micromanage” the situation in a way that “compromises Haystack’s independence.” He also pinned the whole ordeal on the AG’s office, saying prosecutors didn’t reiterate the judge’s entire order when it demanded an outside firm get involved back in November.
